Page0.PageText: This is Mistakes and Memories demo. Press ENTER to proceed to the next page.

Page1.PageText: Please use Chromium or Firefox for the best experience.

Page2.PageText: Everytime you see a child you want to cry.

Page3.PageText: You are not an average person.

Page9.PageText: I just can’t wait do go to Mettlach tomorrow.

Page12.PageText: I am finally taking a vacation the day after tomorrow, sooo I won’t be in Mettlach.

Page15.PageText: I was trying to play it cool, but I was hysterical.

Page16.PageText: It’s been a week since I moved to Mettlach.

Page17.PageText: I have nightmares in my head. I am crying myself to sleep, while the mistake is spiralling in my head.

Page18.PageText: I am like a multi-headed monster and I like it.

Page19.PageText: Don’t let your mind drive you crazy.
